data.partBlankContent: We are planning to move to a new apartment when our lease is up at the end of the winter. At th__ point, we wi__ have li___ in o__ current ren___ for fi__ years! We ne__ a cha___ of pa__, s_ we're loo____ for a unit that's very diff_____ from o__ current o__. Right now, the rental market is slow, but I suspect that it will pick up towards the end of the year.
data.fullContent: We are planning to move to a new apartment when our lease is up at the end of the winter. At that point, we will have lived in our current rental for five years! We need a change of past, so we're looking for a unit that's very different from our current one. Right now, the rental market is slow, but I suspect that it will pick up towards the end of the year.
data.answer: 我们计划在今冬租约一到期就搬到一套新公寓去。到那时，我们已经在现在租的房子里住了5年了!我们需要改变一下过去，所以我们在找一套和现在完全不同的房子。目前，租赁市场发展缓慢，但我认为年底前会加速。
